definition[0]: to throw something in a careless or relaxed way
example[0]: Tania chucked her bag down on the sofa.
note[0]: chuck something on/out of/into etc something
example[1]: I chucked a few things into a suitcase and left.
example[2]: Chuck me that pen, would you?
definition[1]: to throw something away because you do not want it anymore
example[3]: I think I might have chucked it by mistake.
example[4]: You havenâ€™t chucked your job, have you?
definition[3]: to end a romantic relationship with someone
definition[4]: part of a machine that holds something firmly so that it does not move
definition[5]: a friendly word used to address someone in some parts of northern England
